mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM user1 WHERE uadmin!=#{uadmin} ORDER BY userno asc) a ) WHERE rnum>=#{startrow} and rnum<=#{endrow}
SELECT count(*) FROM reserve WHERE userno=#{userno} or re_no in (SELECT re.re_no FROM reserve re, room ro WHERE ro.userno=#{userno} and ro.roomno=re.roomno)

SELECT re.re_no as re_no, uc.name as cname, ro.rname as rname, to_char(re.startday, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as startday, to_char(re.endday, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as endday, ro.raddress as raddress, uh.name as hname FROM reserve re, room ro, user1 uc, user1 uh WHERE re.roomno = ro.roomno and re.userno = uc.userno and uh.userno = ro.userno and uc.uadmin != #{uadmin}
SELECT userno, COUNT(userno) as count from room group by userno
SELECT * FROM room WHERE userno=#{userno} ORDER BY roomno asc
